page.title: 20The Children & other helpers
page.content:
Alison Moore,Helen Roberts,Helen Graham,Darren Robertson,Stephen Paxton,Mark Bevis,Kevin Drew,Simon Steele,Robert Turley,Jason Whettleton,Karl Morrison,Luke Hartley,Derek Smith,Dominic Fennelly,Timothy Storer and Christopher Buckman.
We would also like to thank Mr Marshman and the children of Newton Tony School for their help and hospitality.
We would also like to thank Mr Maffee,Mr Holmes,Mrs Aubrey,Mrs Wagg,Rev.G.Davies,Mr Peter Smith, Mr Taberer and all the other parents and friends,too numerous to mention, who have helped us with this survey.
